channel.title: kurtsopinions - personal blog of kurt lojka
channel.description: this is my personal blog that features my opinions on marketing, startups, self-improvement.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
this is my first blog entry

hi there, this is my first blog entry. I’m not only writing this blog to voice my opinions. It’s also a project to improve my coding skills. That’s why I’m generating this blog utilizing jekyll.

Please let me know your feedback. You can reach me via email or on twitter.

item.title: Awakening
item.description:
Awakening

Hey there, it’s been a while since my first blog post. Part of the problem was lack of time but the other part was a technical challenge. I had difficulties pushing my changes to github.

First of all I had to fight to commit all my changes to my branch. The command git commit didn’t work as expected as no changes were getting picked up. A short google search later git commit -a did the trick for me. The tougher problem I faced was pushing my changes to github. I had difficulties to connect to my github account. It turned out that I need to create a personal access token, because of the 2FA I have in place. Unfortunately I didn’t got it to work until recently.

I now plan to post more regularly. Stay tuned.
